experience.description: Implemented and project managed three new systems across the Lettings, Build-to-Rent, and Block Management divisions. Product managed build-to-rent products. Lead Power BI developer and Excel specialist.

Led the technical support team delivering configuration, change request, and lifecycle upgrade processes across multiple project workstreams and BAU. Used JIRA, Cherwell, AutoDesk, Revit, and VS Code for HTML, CSS, and XML changes.
Delivered software implementation services streamlining business processes for buildings, people, and assets in the real estate and facilities management sector.
SAP implementation and enterprise system project management, delivering rollouts for clients across the UK.
Managed stakeholder engagement, training delivery, and change management programmes across the organisation.
Led Kronos workforce management implementations across field-based store locations, covering payroll administration, training delivery, and new store setup.
Managed online operations for this independent British software solutions delivery company, based at Lewes Road, Brighton.
